name: Scrap World
description:
Scrap World is an immersive First Person Shooter Made for the Boss Rush Jam Febuary 2023

This is our first Game Jam as designers so please be gentle with us. 

Controls:

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Parry

A and D - Movement

There is a secret control as well hidden in the game. Let us know if you found what it is (clues are in game)

Designers:

Riley Johnson - Game Programer

Fristi - 3D Artist

Lila - Composer

Dom Wood - Game Designer

Antonio Martinez - Level Designer
